triplets: Food prepared by baking a mixture of flour, sugar, eggs, and other ingredients, often decorated and served on special occasions
Eating, Celebrations such as birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, or festive events
Flour, Sugar, Eggs, Butter or oil, Milk, Baking powder; additional ingredients like chocolate, fruits, or nuts depending on recipe
Decorations (optional) such as fondant, sprinkles, or edible toppers
Varies depending on ingredients, frosting, and decoration; common colors include brown, white, pink, and multicolor
Various bakeries, home bakers, and confectionery producers
Typically 500 grams to 5 kg depending on type and size
Approximately 5–20 cm per cake layer; multi-layer cakes may be taller
1–7 days depending on ingredients, storage conditions, and whether it is refrigerated
